There's some sort of innate connection between man and the ocean. And for some that connection runs much deeper. For him the the best things best things in life are free; sun sand and ocean. No time for bustling cities or crowded stores, sun's up see you later. So if the season is right, give him a gift that's sure to see some good beach action.

The essentials.

If he's still using a bathroom towel change that immediately. A beach towel should look like summer made of cotton, and for every beige towel that arrives on the beach a clownfish dies. So hook him up with a 100% cotton Billabong Mens's Spinner Towel and he'll never look back. You'll also spare a couple clownfish. But having a wet towel full of sand isn't ideal, so separate his drying and chilling. The MatPro Large Sand Escape Outdoor Banket is big enough for him and a few buddies to chillout and keep their stuff sand free. It dries in seconds, folds up real small and eliminates the sandy towel problem.

They provide the tunes, keep us in touch and take all the pictures. But they die pretty quick. So a soild powerbank might not be the sexiest gift but it rates pretty highly in function.
